name: IFT CFAÂ® Exam Prep
description: Study on the Go with new IFT App for Level I, II, III.  Get the IFT App now and Accelerate your Learning!  IFT has helped thousands of students pass the challenging CFA Program Exams since 2011. IFT videos, study notes and other materials are popular world-over!  Download the FREE IFT App to watch your paid or free IFT videos, which you also have access to on the IFT Learning Portal (ILP). Documents such Study Notes and Formula sheets, and also paid videos can also be downloaded for viewing off-line.  IFT detailed videos help you to MASTER the exam curriculum. Each Learning Outcome Statement is covered, and examples are solved. In addition to the detailed videos, you can watch other videos purchased from IFT, such as High-Yield videos, Example videos, Solved Question videos, etc.  Notes: 1) If you already have an account on www.ift.world then please login on the app the same way you login at the IFT website (i.e. use your existing email/password or Facebook/Google login). If you have not registered with IFT recently you can choose email or social login. 2) Only Paid IFT videos can be downloaded in the App for watching when you are off-line. 3) This App replaces the IFT High-Yield App. High-Yield videos and notes will be available on this app also.  What you can do with the IFT App:  Sign up for free videos/trial account  Watch all IFT videos for all Levels (I, II, III)  View all study notes & documents  Download videos and notes/documents for use when off-line  Save videos to favorites list  Watch other useful IFT videos  Delete all or some downloaded videos to save space
